## repeatedCombination() function

Returns a new array which contains `n`<!-- -->-combinations with repeatation of elemenets of `array`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function repeatedCombination<T>(array: readonly T[], n: number): T[][];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | readonly T\[\] | The target array |
|  n | number | Size of combination |

<b>Returns:</b>

T\[\]\[\]

A new array with combinations with repeatation
